headline: A Look At Huntington Bancshares (HBAN) Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength
summary: Event context and recent performance snapshot Huntington Bancshares (HBAN) has drawn fresh attention after recent share moves, with the stock last closing at $17.88. Investors are weighing that price against its reported fundamentals and recent return profile. See our latest analysis for Huntington Bancshares. The recent 2.3% 1 day share price return at $17.88 builds on a 17.1% 90 day share price return, while the 5 year total shareholder return of 57.0% points to a longer term track record...

headline: Huntington Bancshares Merger With Cadence Reshapes Footprint And Valuation Outlook
summary: Huntington Bancshares (NasdaqGS:HBAN) has completed its merger with Cadence Bank. The transaction expands Huntington's regional presence across Texas and the broader South. New board members from Cadence Bank have been appointed to Huntington's leadership. For you as an investor, this deal reshapes what Huntington Bancshares is as a regional bank by adding new markets and customer relationships in the South on top of its existing franchise. The company provides traditional banking services,...

headline: Huntington Bank Completes Merger with Cadence Bank, Expanding Presence Across Texas and the South
summary: Huntington Bancshares Incorporated (Nasdaq: HBAN) today announced it has closed its merger with Cadence Bank, a regional bank headquartered in Houston, Texas and Tupelo, Mississippi.
